message: Vi @ericflo: Convore Android app, I loaded on My Nexus S works great will be helpful at Pycon!>> (you need untrusted sources enabled,(but y'all knew that right!) http://t.co/aMWqzv9 (Not made by us, but it's pretty darn good IMO)
Please get this into the market! Untrusted apps are not something I can trust with the credentials I have on my phone.
+1 not for the same reason but I hate untrusted apps.
"i want to work out most of the kinks before fully releasing it into the wild. it still crashes too often if the connection is unstable. in a week or two i will think about it"
hehe I applaud the developers efforts! awesome to see an app so soon.
testing it right now. looks awesome
waiting for something to be stable before putting it on the android market? wow, first time for everything
Cool! I thought they only had iPhone... this is going to be vital for #PyCon survival...
I donwloaded and installed but it crashed at first, so I had to uninstall and then re-install. Is working good now, I'm using it to write this post. :-)
@juandg thanks for the tip on iphone. I got it on the ipad and it's ok. Will love to get a native ipad app :)
@Gulopine nice thing is with Android there is an option to release early..so we have something
Can we put images in here? I made a QR code for it: http://j.mp/hN53mD.qrcode
@juandg http://convore.com/convorsation/ and I just want to point out again this is not developed by us :)
